name: Perlagus of Summa
description:
====Game detail====

this is just flash game (swf) that coverted to exe

old style fighting game , slow paced , story mode(translation is not completed)

Weapon types

1) 1 handed weapon and sheild (does extra damage to armor)

2) polearm (does extra damage to armor)

3) sword (does extra damageto flesh or non armored)

4) Great sword (does extra damage to flesh or non armored)

Loadout types

there is 7 faction of loadout you can find in the game.

Rule

if you surrender you will lost a very few money.

if you lose you will lost a lot of money (medieval ransom)

Control

A - attack

S - strike

D - block

A + D - grab

Fighting guide

if you blocked enemie's attack you will perfrom a counter attack and do some damage to enemie.

you can grab and throw enemie that are blocking.

But most importantly thanks for playing.
